title: Comfortable stay
text: Stayed at the Courtyard for one night. The hotel is situated near many eateries and shopping. Easily accessible, plenty of parking. The rooms are clean and well maintained. The bed is sooo comfortable and the shower is very good. The front desk staff was professional and friendly. The hotel offers all required amenities in a relaxed atmosphere. Nothing negative to say about our stay. Would use this hotel again while in Hamilton.

title: Tasty pizza
text: Went to Sasso for the first time on a Tuesday night. We were promptly seated and the service was excellent. The wood oven pizza was delicious. The ingredients fresh and the mix of toppings was very tasty and interesting. definitely a must for pizza lovers.

title: Nice venue for dinner
text: Went for dinner while visiting Kitchener. We were promptly seated, the service was excellent and the staff helpful and friendly. The pasta is very good and the portions generous. Very relaxed atmosphere. Good choice of wines. Moderate prices. Overall a very satisfying dinner. We would definitely return.

title: Good lunch, slow service
text: Stopped for lunch on a Saturday around 13:00 hrs and the place was very busy. The food is fresh and well prepared. However, the service was very slow and we waited over half hour to get our burger and pita. Maybe they needed more help in the kitchen.
